item.description:
Hello there,

This month's speakers will explain the Massachusetts tax title process in Massachusetts and how the assignment of tax titles at auction can be an excellent investment vehicle. In 2004, Massachusetts General Law was amended to allow Municipalities to sell individual tax titles (i.e. municipal tax debt on individual properties).  This presentation is all steak, no sizzle. We will cut to the chase and allow a generous time period for Q & A.

Presentation Main Points:

Main Points:

• Terminology of the tax title process
• Specific requirements for purchasing tax titles at auction
• Massachusetts municipal tax title process
• Massachusetts individual tax title assignment auction process
• Investor strategies
• Return on investment
• Potential pitfalls
• Timeline scenarios

 

We hope to see you all Wednesday Night!

The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door
 


Ask about getting YOUR membership today! 

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: MA Tax Title and Possession Assets - Don't Miss this!
